trans-unit.source: The ColumnClickEventArgs class provides the zero-based index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class of the column that is clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: ColumnClickEventArgs 类提供了中的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>在中单击的列的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在事件处理程序中使用此信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件，以确定所单击的哪一列在列中数据上执行任务。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
The zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击列的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取单击的列的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use the information provided by this property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event to determine which column is being clicked to perform tasks on the data within the column.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性的事件处理程序中提供的信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件，以确定所单击的哪一列在列中数据上执行任务。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>单击的列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>
